head.title: Bay Scallops with Lemon and Dill

directions.step: Coat Heavy Large Skillet Generously With Nonstick Vegetable Spray. Add Oleo & Melt Over Medium Heat. Add Scallops & Stir Until Almostopaque, About 2 Min. Transfer To A Bowl Using A Slotted Spoon. Add Vermouth, Lemon Juice & Lemon Peel To Skillet & Boil Until Reduced To A Thick Glaze, About 5 Min. Add Any Juices Exuded By The Scallops & Boil Until Reduced To Glaze. Return Scallops To Skillet & Stir Until Coated With Sauce. Mix in Dill & Pepper. Serve Immediately.
